description: An unexpected surprise in the heart of the lowlands. In this charming farmhouse situated in open countryside, Claudio prepares top-quality, almost exclusively fish and seafood cuisine with a southern Italian influence (especially from his native Puglia). There’s also a simpler, cheaper menu on weekday lunchtimes.
